description: Schema for submitting a molecular library.
title: Library

___fragmentation_methods.description: A list of nucleic acid fragmentation methods and restriction enzymes used in library preparation.
___fragmentation_methods.title: Fragmentation methods

items.description: A short description or reference of the nucleic acid fragmentation protocol used in library preparation.
items.title: Fragmentation method

___barcode_details.description: For single cell biosamples, the barcodes used to identify the biosamples.
___barcode_details.title: Single cell barcodes information

___plate_id.description: The plate the single cell sample comes from.
___plate_id.title: Identifier of the plate the single cell sample originated from

___plate_location.description: The location (such as A1) of the single cell sample on the plate.
___plate_location.title: Position of the single cell sample on the plate

___lot_id.description: The lot identifier provided by the vendor, for nucleic acids or proteins purchased directly from a vendor (e.g. total RNA).

___product_id.description: The product identifier provided by the vendor, for nucleic acids or proteins purchased directly from a vendor (e.g. total RNA).

oneOf.comment: Historical size selection methods, not valid for new submissions.
enum: Only RNAs greater than 200 nucleotides. The inserts for the library will vary from ~ 100 - 700 base pairs.
Only RNAs greater than 200 nucleotides. The insert for the library will vary from ~ 100 - 700 base pairs.

___library_size_selection_method.description: A short description or reference of the size selection protocol used in library preparation, if applicable.
___library_size_selection_method.title: Size selection method

___size_range.description: The measured size range of the purified nucleic acid, in bp.
___size_range.title: Size range

___depleted_in_term_name.description: SO (Sequence Ontology) term best matching the nucleic acid that was diminished from the library.
___depleted_in_term_name.title: Depleted in term

___alternate_accessions.description: Accessions previously assigned to objects that have been merged with this object.
___alternate_accessions.comment: Do not submit. Only admins are allowed to set or update this value.
___alternate_accessions.title: Alternate accessions

items.description: An accession previously assigned to an object that has been merged with this object.
items.comment: Only accessions of objects that have status equal replaced will work here.
items.title: Alternate Accession

___queried_RNP_size_range.description: The measured size range of queried ribonucleoprotein (RNP), in kD.
___queried_RNP_size_range.comment: This size range could be specified for eCLIP experiments and other RNA-binding protein assays.
___queried_RNP_size_range.title: Queried RNP size range

___fragmentation_date.description: The date that the nucleic acid was fragmented. The date applies to all fragmentation methods specified.
___fragmentation_date.comment: Date can be submitted in as YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSTZD (TZD is the time zone designator; use Z to express time in UTC or for time expressed in local time add a time zone offset from UTC +HH:MM or -HH:MM).
___fragmentation_date.title: Fragmentation date

oneOf.comment: Historical lysis methods, not valid for new submissions.
enum: [NPB (5% BSA (Sigma), 0.2% IGEPAL-CA630 (Sigma), cOmplete (Roche), 1mM DTT in PBS)]
72 degrees for 3 minutes in the presence of Triton

___lysis_method.description: A short description or reference of the cell lysis protocol used in library preparation, if applicable.
___lysis_method.title: Lysis method

___crosslinking_method.description: A short description or reference of the crosslinking protocol used in library preparation, if applicable.
___crosslinking_method.title: Crosslinking method

___nucleic_acid_starting_quantity.description: The starting amount of nucleic acid before selection and purification.
___nucleic_acid_starting_quantity.title: Nucleic acid starting quantity

enum: Maxwell 16 LEV simpleRNA Cells Kit (Promega cat#: AS1270)
RNeasy Lipid Tissue Mini Kit (QIAGEN cat#74804)
RNeasy Plus Mini Kit Qiagen cat#74134 plus additional on column Dnase treatment

oneOf.comment: Historical extraction methods, not valid for new submissions.
enum: TruChIP chromatin shearing reagent kit Covaris cat# 520154, sonication Covaris M220, IP (home protocol), DNA isolation with QIAquick PCR Purification Kit cat# 28104.

___extraction_method.description: A short description or reference of the nucleic acid extraction protocol used in library preparation, if applicable.
___extraction_method.title: Extraction method

___biosample.description: The biosample that nucleic acid was isolated from to generate the library.
___biosample.title: Biosample

___nucleic_acid_term_name.description: SO (Sequence Ontology) term best matching the molecule isolated to generate the library (e.g. 'RNA' for a total RNA library, even if that library is subsequently reverse transcribed for DNA sequencing.)
___nucleic_acid_term_name.title: Library material

___dbxrefs.description: Identifiers from external resources that may have 1-to-1 or 1-to-many relationships with ENCODE objects..
___dbxrefs.title: External resources

items.description: Identifier from an external resource that may have 1-to-1 or 1-to-many relationships with ENCODE objects.
items.title: External identifier

___source.description: The vendor, for nucleic acids or proteins purchased directly from a vendor (e.g. total RNA).

___type.description: Information (type or name) for adapter(s) specified in the adapter file. This info will be used to identify how the adapter file should be feed to a pipeline.
___type.title: Adapter type

___spikeins_used.description: The datasets containing the fasta and the concentrations of the library spike-ins.
___spikeins_used.title: Spike-ins datasets used

___strand_specificity.description: The preparation of the library uses a strand-specific protocol.
___strand_specificity.title: Strand specific

___mint_mixture_identifier.description: Identifier of the chromatin preps mixture.
___mint_mixture_identifier.comment: Chromatin preps mixture identifier that is used in MINT-ChIP experiments.
___mint_mixture_identifier.title: MINT mixture identifier

___nucleic_acid_starting_quantity_units.description: The units used for starting amount of nucleic acid.
___nucleic_acid_starting_quantity_units.title: Nucleic acid starting quantity units

___construction_platform.description: The device used to construct the library.
___construction_platform.comment: Use in cases of automated/proprietary library preparation (Fluidigm, 10X, etc.)
___construction_platform.title: Platform
